thread.title: Black Metal Band Cradle Of Filth Repulsed By Kanye West's T-Shirt
thread.title_full: Black Metal Band Cradle Of Filth Repulsed By Kanye West's T-Shirt

author: Kyle Eustice
title: Black Metal Band Cradle Of Filth Repulsed By Kanye West's T-Shirt
text:
11 
Apparently, the black metal band Cradle of Filth is too cool for Kanye West . In a Facebook post created last Wednesday (March 15), the band reacted negatively to a paparazzi photo originally posted by Daily Mail that caught West going out for dinner in Los Angeles wearing a long-sleeved T-shirt displaying the name of the outrageously dark Suffolk outfit. 
“Kanye West. Cradle Of Filth fan. Fortunately not a collaborator,” the post read, making it clear the members of the group want nothing to do with Yeezy. West, however, presumably has better things to do than sweat what the longtime metal band thinks of him. The celebrated rapper was just featured on Drake’s recent More Life track, “Glow,” and is most likely working on some kind of masterpiece that may or may not involve a NASA theme. Whatever the case, fans of The Life Of Pablo won’t have to worry about demon-faced death metal artists popping up on his next project — at least not yet.
